post.text: Hillary Clinton was for TPP before she was against it! She even called it the "gold standard" of trade agreements!

comment.author: Chelsey
comment.text: Stop & Frisk = Terry v Ohio several years ago.... aka Terry Stop

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Several years ago?? Probably before you were born

replies.author: Chelsey
replies.text: Yeah Goose, I was thinking that was something like in the 60s

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: 1968 to be exact, still requires reasonable suspicion, in NY they were just randomly searching people
